About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Who Am I?

Hello! My name is Emircan and currently I'm computer engineering student at Bahcesehir University in Turkey. Also I work as a freelancer on different freelancer platforms. I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2014 when I decided to prepare basic html websites and at this stage of my life, I'm giving my best to improve my development skills for the future which is involved with my dreams.

Characteristically, I'm a well organised, problem solver person. I spend my free time by reading books, going to the gym, hanging out with my friends and improving myself about programming and development. Also, I'm fan of fps games like CS:GO, Valorant and Apex Legends. Moreover, I'm interested in different kinds of sports such as football, table tennis and real tennis.
